title: Retire a Public Asset
description: A city vehicle has reached the end of its service life and needs to be retired from the asset management system and sent to auction.

tasks.description: Identify the vehicle to be retired in the asset management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The fleet manager locates the correct vehicle record.

tasks.description: Update the asset's status to 'Retired' or 'Pending Disposal'.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager successfully updates the status of the asset.

tasks.description: Generate the necessary paperwork to transfer the asset to the city's auctioneer.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager creates the documentation needed to dispose of the vehicle.
